website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you’re looking for a high-quality lamp that packs a lot of creative whimsy, yet doesn’t overwhelm with features.
pros: “Branches” can be customized or arranged to the configuration you want
Solid base gives it a lot of stability
cons: The lights are pretty bright and can’t be dimmed
Some buyers note quality issues with flimsy joints or shorts in the cord

customer_reviews.title: The Amazing Disposable Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Nobody sells replacement bulbs this size, and support can’t tell me who does. Once they’re done, they’re done, and you have a nice...statue or something...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really cool lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool lamp! You can assemble it anyway that you'd like, and change it again and again for a different look. The bulb lights are really bright leds, and give off a lot of light. The only thing I wasn't expecting was for it to be so small. It would have looked awesome being a little bit bigger, or maybe if it had more branch extension pieces. I do love how easy it was to set up, and it comes with ample cord so you can pretty much put it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: chicmama

customer_reviews.title: Super easy assembly, bright & unique looking!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool lamp - very different from anything we have. It comes very well packaged in layers & you just open & screw together in whatever shape you want. The LED bulbs are bright, true white, & really illuminate a space. I’m using it at night in a dark area of the kitchen & love the way it looks! Lights the area without turning on all the overhead fixtures. Definitely a fan! (Thanks for reading this & hope it’s Helpful!)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Totally great light and a wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for my office and am impressed with it. When one of the bulbs broke, customer service was amazing and mailed a replacement bulb right out (though I would recommend getting a few at a time because of the cost of the bulb isn't much and shipping is a flat rate). I would recommend this light. In fact when I get a bigger office, I am thinking of getting another one because you can configure them in many different ways. Definitely recommend this light and customer service. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M

customer_reviews.title: So fun and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this little lamp. It so easy to assemble and you can virtually change the look of the lamp on a daily basis if you like. The lightbulbs are included and I immediately claimed it for my nightstand. I originally wanted it in our guest room but I found it so attractive and unusual that I decided it looked much better in my bedroom. It makes reading in bed easier and this would make a really great present. Assume deal and I got the lamp in record time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Toste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to buy this thing a long time and finally did it. To those put off by the logo (as I was) the lamp I recurved has NO LOGO on the base - the entire lamp is elegant white. Bulbs are soft white, not too bright but do provide adequate bedside light for reading ect. The only complaint I have is that the wire is very sensitive and if the lamp is moved or bumped it is likely to flicker or turn off. Beautiful accent to my home, very worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy with this lamp! It’s so simple and fun to assemble. The modern look is funky and it’s pretty bright so it’s functional in addition to looking cool. I am using it as a bedside lamp. It looked so great my fiancé wants one for his side of the bed too. Usually modem lighting and furniture is more expensive but this lamp is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Murgatroyd Humperdink

customer_reviews.title: Cute lights for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these lights for my apartment and I absolutely love them!! Easy to assemble and look great!! 1 replacement bulb was given with each light which should be perfectly fine- LED light bulbs don’t burn out ( or at least not for a long time) so I’m not sure why other reviews where so negative about that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting lamp, fun to design!
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun in interesting lamp to play with, you can get a lot different looks just by moving or twisting to different sides, lights are bright and Opaque, It has a very sturdy base, The arms of the tree are very sturdy also... Given as a gift would definitely think about getting my own...
customer_reviews.author: B Ran

customer_reviews.title: Very classy modern light!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! They make a modern statement in my bedroom! The only drawback is that the light switch is not near the lamp, but way down the cord. Next time we have electric work done we will have it moved closer. Other than that, they are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Roth

customer_reviews.title: Interestingly unusual
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I put it on a small white corner cabinet in my reading room. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: RNPR

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp and everyone who sees it mentions how interesting and unique it is. Also very functional in my family room. I have ladder bookcases on one side of the room and needed some light on this side and nice to find a lamp that is an art piece and functional that I can put on the bookcases
customer_reviews.author: Emily P.

customer_reviews.title: So cool!! I love this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this lamp. You can easily change the branches to be any design, and it's so simple. Ita beautiful. The only negative is the wire doesn't fit snugly into the port, so if you touch/move the lamp the lights will go out. You just have to readjust the cord after positioning. I'd suggest this lamp to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: I Still Love This LAMP!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp a year and a half, and I run it when I am at work, four days a week, 11-12 hours at a time, and I've not had any trouble with it. It is still as bright and lovely as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Change the branches to your taste
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful accent lamp. Easy to assemble, it has a modern yet soft presentation. The bright lite is great for reading and you can change the look by rearranging the branches.
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Moment

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is awesome! It is repositionable and thus offers great versatility. Perfect amount of light to give a cozy feel but still be able to read etc. Modern touch at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it great for my little home office with white furniture hardly recomend giving bright light for whole room
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Super cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Not too bright, not too dim. Perfect for my livingroom. Looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Solid lamp! Love it! Favorite Amazon purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even put into words how much I love this lamp! It's really heavy too, I was surprised by how heavy it was. I plan on ordering atleast 1 more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Gammons

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bright.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought but looks cute. Also brighter than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So cool and different. Get compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Jeffcoat

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I got it to put on a bookcase file show and light. Very cool lamp. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: J. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Electrical is sketchy on the plug to lamp socket.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this used for a small discount. My daughter loves the design and versatility of creation. If the light flickers out all we do is wiggle the cord and it's fine. Very precious overall.
customer_reviews.author: orly angelo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive lighting
customer_reviews.text: Creative, free-form table light that puts out a ton of lumens for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Chizmo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful lamp I’ve ever had. The price is absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this silly lamp. I get so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Mandi James

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and bright
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, would be great in a kids room but I got it for my adult son’s NY apartment. Much brighter than I thought, which is a good thing! Fun to assemble, actually.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Segura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lamps, ordered two for my room and theyre perfect for my desk. Because of the customization, I was able to have them overhang to put light exactly where it needed to be, for just under $20 I couldnt be happier. To the other customers complaining about the bulbs, theyre led and as such should last years, not bad for such a cheap lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great table lamp! Right and easy to put together. I like that we can change the design!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is amazing my room looks so cozy and exelent price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like this in theory. It's simple, effective and looks good. In practice I get three dead bulbs iny delivery. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: ARJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cool light!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and looks amazing. I love the light on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cute modern lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is fun and brightens up any room.
customer_reviews.author: Durell Flood

customer_reviews.title: Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I loved the looks of this lamp, and the brightness was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and doesnt come with bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar lamp to this in a science fiction movie years ago and I've always wanted one. This is a very pretty lamp and it was easy to assemble. The light is super bright and gives my office a lot more light. The downsides? the bulbs are super fragile! when I was removing it from the tight packaging it flew across the room and shattered and it comes with no replacement bulbs. I feel like it should come with at least ONE replacement bulb.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: A great lamp that let you shape it to what you want it to look like, puts out plenty of light and it's LED.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

product_meta.title: Tenergy Lumi Bloom Modern Table Lamp 8W LED DIY Nightstand Lamp Transformable for Hundreds Possible Shapes with 8 Warm White Bulbs Creative Stylish Lamp for Living Room Bedroom Office Ideal Gift
feature_bullets: LUMINOUS BLOOM LED WHITE LAMP - The uniquely designed led desk lamps has 8 bulbs (and one spare bulb) that emits 3000k up to 750lm warm white light for beautiful radiance. This lighted LED lamp is a great center piece in the office, bedroom or living room (Note: indoor use only).

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES - Become the designer of this innovative table lamp with its easily configurable branch pieces. With hundreds of possible designs our transformable A fun and creative centerpiece desk lamp for college dorm rooms.

NO FATIGUE BRIGHTNESS - Accentuate the office with our decor lamp that has a comfortable eye care light brightness without a flicker or dazzle effect. Leave your Lumi Bloom in the on position and combine it with a smart outlet for easy control with Alexa or Google Home. Or use a wall switch for convenient on/off access by flipping a switch.
LOW VOLTAGE & BPA FREE SAFETY DESIGN - The lighted tree lamp is built with safe-to-touch low voltage sockets and BPA free material to be used safely around the home or office.

ENERGY SAVING TABLE LAMP & 2 YEARS EXTENDED WARRANTY - The LED light bulbs consume 85% less energy and last 20 times longer than incandescent bulbs. Register your Tenergy Lumi Bloom simple designs lamp to receive 2 years extended warranty and lifetime support from our friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
